devdoc.details: Manages configuration settings and roles for the protocol.

StringsInsufficientHexLength(uint256,uin.details: The `value` string doesn't fit in the specified `length`.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`.

hasRole(bytes32,address).details: Checks if an account has a specific role.

returns._0: True if the account has the role, false otherwise.

initialize().details: Initializes the contract by setting the default admin role to the deployer.

setIntialValues(address,address,address,.details: Sets initial values for the configuration.

params._rewardDispatcher: Address of the reward dispatcher contract.

params._veMetisMinter: Address of the veMetis minter contract.

devdoc.title: Config

config().notice: holds the address of the config contract
